ValidationRule.description: Audit case for Frontier Auditors if Audit Findings = Order Rejected or Other, Audit Finding Details are required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Audit_Findings__c ,"Order Rejected"), ISPICKVAL(Audit_Findings__c ,"Other") ), ISBLANK(Audit_Findings_Details__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Audit Findings = Order Rejected or Other, Audit Finding Details are required.
